local_intent: Place bread at plate center with correct yaw, release, and retreat; ensure pose above plate and orientation before placing.
coherence_with_global: Implements the place phase: ensure at plate_above and yaw=0, execute PlaceAt(plate_center, yaw=0, press_force=10, timeout=1200), open gripper, verify release via inverted ObjectInGripper(bread), then retreat 0.1m, matching the GLOBAL_BT sequence.
